title: Better Days - Post-apocalyptic Adventure Music Collection
description: Nostalgic storytelling tracks, tension building and combat music, rich organic ambients perfect as background or exploration music and more. It would be perfect choice for every story rich game.
longDescription:
SoundCloud Preview


Better Days - Post-apocalyptic Adventure Music Collection

This music pack contains 134 professionally composed, produced and mixed audio files made from 10 tracks. Full tracks, long loops, short loops, intros with variants included.


Carefully selected instruments such as guitars, strings, organic pads and synths will help you achieve a feeling of nostalgia, loneliness and tension, but also warm sense of being safe. Perfect mix for survival, RPG, action game and more.


Ready to go:

Full tracks and loops included.


Safe to use:

All of my music is royalty free and streaming friendly. You can be sure that streamers will not get copyright claim from YouTube, Twitch, etc. while streaming your game with my music.
